'''Stone Slate''' is a Quest Item obtained from chests after completing certain [[Ishine Script]] puzzles around [[Tsurumi Island]]. Seven are obtainable and are used in the "[[Ishine Script Deciphering]]" [[Hidden Exploration Objective]].
